alert.note: Alert for Dyer; Gibson; Obion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 8:33AM CST until January 07 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee... North Fork Obion River near Martin Obion River near Obion For the Obion River...including Martin, Obion, Bogota...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Obion River near Obion. * WHEN...From late tonight to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, Farmland near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 32.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 34.5 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 34.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
